title: Spartan Council Election 3.0
body:
#### What is the Spartan Council Election?

[SIP-93](https://sips.synthetix.io/sips/sip-93) explains the process and motives behind the Spartan Council. You can also read about it in the [blog post](https://blog.synthetix.io/the-spartan-council-election/). 

[SIP-104](https://sips.synthetix.io/sips/sip-104) explains the transition from liquid democracy to voter dilution which applies to this Spartan Council epoch. You can also read about it in the [blog post](https://blog.synthetix.io/spartan-council-updates-voting-live-for-next-epoch-integration-into-staking-dapp/)

The current council epoch is 3 months, successful Spartan Council members are paid a monthly stipend by the Synthetix Protocol DAO.

#### How are votes weighted?
To vote in the election, SNX holders will need to have staked within the last fee period snapshot before the start of the Election Period. 

Each staking wallet will be able to vote for one nominee, and a wallet's vote weighting takes their staking debt at the relevant snapshot and multiplies it quadratically, as outlined in [SIP-90](https://sips.synthetix.io/sips/sip-90).

#### How to vote?
Choose an option below.

To help match the wallet address with the nominee identity visit the spreadsheet [here](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1nbAUAioVvxlhtBzUI0dwmedGC2R3AZL-mDws7BzvZDQ/edit?usp=sharing)
author: 0xbeBF7295A9Ddc37e33609790b12FBe3dAF93cC73
